name: NodeLogic - logic gates simulator
description:
NodeLogic

Input:

  • MouseButtonLeft - move nodes,connect and select
  • MouseButtonRight - change zoom
  • MouseButtonMiddle - move camera
  • D-duplicate node
  • Delete-delete node

Description:

Simple logic simulator made on unity.

Have all basic and more other logic gates:

  1. And
  2. Or
  3. Not
  4. Nand
  5. Nor
  6. Xor
  7. Xnor
  8. JK trigger
  9. SR trigger
  10. Push button
  11. Toggle button
  12. Delay
  13. Pulse
  14. Clock
  15. Bit display
  16. RGB display with 9 colors
  17. Label
